<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">

  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>

  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1765085973</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">A perspective on inquiry</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Eine Perspektive auf Anfrage</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Une perspective sur l'enquête</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Um perspective no inquérito</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Una prospettiva sull'inchiesta</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Μια προοπτική στην έρευνα</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Una perspectiva en pregunta</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">In this interview, Norman Budnitz, cofounder of the Center for Inquiry Based Learning, talks about inquiry and how to teach with it in a K-12 classroom.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Science and Technology</string>
          </keyword>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">In diesem Interview befaßt sich normannisches 
Budnitz, cofounder der Mitte für das Anfrage gegründete Lernen, mit 
Anfrage und wie man mit ihm in einem Klassenzimmer K-12 unterrichtet.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Dans cette entrevue, Budnitz normand, cofounder du
centre pour l'étude basée par enquête, parle de l'enquête et 
comment enseigner avec lui dans une salle de classe K-12.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Nesta entrevista, Budnitz normando, cofounder do 
centro para o inquérito baseou a aprendizagem, as conversas sobre o 
inquérito e como ensinar com ele em uma sala de aula K-12.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">In questa intervista, Budnitz normanno, cofounder 
del centro per l'inchiesta ha basato imparare, i colloqui circa 
l'inchiesta e come insegnare con esso in un'aula K-12.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Σε αυτήν την συνέντευξη, ο Norman Budnitz, 
cofounder του κέντρου για την έρευνα βάσισε την εκμάθηση, τις 
συζητήσεις για την έρευνα και πώς να διδάξει με το σε μια τάξη Κ-
12.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">En esta entrevista, Budnitz normando, cofounder 
del centro para aprender basado pregunta, habla de pregunta y cómo 
enseñar con él en una sala de clase K-12.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Wissenschaft und Technologie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">La Science et technologie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Ciência e tecnologia</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Scienza e tecnologia</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Επιστήμη και τεχνολογία</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Ciencia y tecnología</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
        <lifeCycle>

        </lifeCycle>

        </rights>
      </lom>
    </metadata>
  </description>
